title.rendered: Flybondi Airlines in Buenos Aires, Argentina

content.rendered:
Flybondi, is the first low-cost airline in Argentina. The airline operates Boeing 737-800 aircraft, with bases in Buenos Aires and Córdoba. All aircraft are registered in Argentina.The airline’s inaugural flight from Córdoba’s Ingeniero Aeronáutico Ambrosio L.V. Taravella International Airport to Puerto Iguazú’s Cataratas del Iguazú International Airport took place on 26 January 2018. The company slogan is Spanish: La libertad de volar, or The freedom to fly.

Flybondi Airlines in Buenos Aires, Argentina Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

Address: Buenos Aires, Argentina

Phone: NA

Email: NA

Working hours: NA

Flybondi Airlines Official website: https://flybondi.com/ar

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Flybondi Airlines

Total fleet: 02

  • Boeing 737-800

Flybondi Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Flybondi Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Special Assistance in Flybondi Airlines

Traveling while Pregnant in Flybondi Airlines

  • If you are 28 weeks pregnant or more.
  • If you have a complex pregnancy and have not reached the 32nd week yet.
  • If you are more than 36 weeks pregnant, Flybondi medical area should authorize your medical certificate.

For more details: https://ayuda.flybondi.com/en-us/article/30-when-do-i-need-a-medical-certificate-and-what-information-should-it-contain

Traveling with Pets in Flybondi Airlines

  • Only cats and dogs are allowed.

For more details: https://ayuda.flybondi.com/en-us/article/81-can-my-pet-travel-in-the-cabin

Queries handled by Flybondi Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Flybondi Airlines in Buenos Aires, Argentina Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Flybondi Airlines in Buenos Aires, Argentina: (click on the stars below)
